name: How to Fool a Liar King / 嘘つきな王様の騙し方
description: Regina, the heroine of our story, finds herself magically transported to the land of Eroolia, clueless about how to return home. She meets Juli and his companions who are in the middle of a journey to Laarz, a country of cat people. Will she find out how to get back home? Or will she fall in love before that happens?
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
